name: Allocator's Illusion
tagline: Cooney, Gilbert, and Wilson (2016). When fairness matters less than we expect. PNAS.
body:
### Welcome to the Repository
This is website for the data and study materials for Cooney, Gilbert, and Wilson (2016). When fairness matters less than we expect. _PNAS_

### Contact
Have any questions for the authors? Please email guscooney at gmail.com.
